title: 조건부 조언 (If I were you)
intent: 가정법을 사용하여 정중하고 효과적인 조언을 제시한다.
lexset: if I were you, suggest, recommend, advise, consider, try, avoid, better, should, would
traps: If I were you 고정 표현

seeds.en: If I were you, I would consult a doctor.

seeds.kr: 그 일을 다시 생각해보는 것이 좋겠어요.
seeds.en: I would reconsider that decision if I were you.
If I were you, I would wait a little longer.
I would recommend getting expert help if I were you.
If I were you, I wouldn't miss that opportunity.
I would be more careful with that decision if I were you.
If I were you, I would try a different approach.
I wouldn't worry about that if I were you.
If I were you, I would practice more.
I would accept that offer if I were you.
